channel.title: Archivists' Toolkit on Mark A. Matienzo

item.title: Developing Automated Repository Deposit Modules for Archivists' Toolkit?
item.description: I'd like to gauge interest for people to help add code to Archivists' Toolkit to automate the deposit of digital objects into digital repositories. At first glance, the biggest issue is having to deal with differing deposit APIs for each repository, but using something like SWORD would make sense to bridge this gap. Any and all feedback is welcome!
